citations.narrative:
The ostrich enclosure does not have adequate measures to prevent the birds from escaping when someone enters the
enclosure. The enclosure consists of woven wire mesh fencing attached to wooden posts. The entry point for someone
entering the enclosure to provide food or water for the animals or attend to other husbandry duties is to open an outer
segment of wire that is attached to an inner segment via wire clasps. This does not adequately secure the enclosure to
prevent animals from escaping when someone enters the enclosure.
Failure to secure enclosures can result in animal escape which can lead to injury and/or lack of access to food and water.
Housing facilities for birds must employ security measures that contain all the birds securely such as safety doors,
entry/exit doors to the primary enclosure that are double door, or other systems designed to prevent escape of the birds.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.150(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
The ostrich enclosure does not have adequate measures to prevent the birds from escaping when someone enters the 
enclosure. The enclosure consists of woven wire mesh fencing attached to wooden posts. The entry point for someone 
entering the enclosure to provide food or water for the animals or attend to other husbandry duties is to open an outer 
segment of wire that is attached to an inner segment via wire clasps. This does not adequately secure the enclosure to 
prevent animals from escaping when someone enters the enclosure.  
Failure to secure enclosures can result in animal escape which can lead to injury and/or lack of access to food and water. 
Housing facilities for birds must employ security measures that contain all the birds securely such as safety doors, 
entry/exit doors to the primary enclosure that are double door, or other systems designed to prevent escape of the birds. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
